nodes.text: Neer's Gauntlet was a gauntlet created by the Sith Lord Neer. Gifted anonymously to the Jedi Watchman of the Corbos system, the Jedi Watchman was eventually corrupted by the artifact's power, murdering anyone he suspected of even the smallest infractions. After the Watchman was killed by his Jedi companions, they sent the gauntlet to Ossus for safekeeping. The gauntlet was lost after the Cron Supernova.
